name: Tre
description:
Try and keep the soccer balls up in the air! Collect points and spend them in the shop to get other balls like the moon or a giant coin! This game was made in about two days after a friend challenged me to do it. It isn't really a complete game, but I appreciate your feedback anyway!

Here is the link to my devlog about making it!

https://youtu.be/2_9DUWUMF3s
